org.apache.james.postage.jmx
Class JVMResourceSamplerWorker

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.james.postage.jmx.JVMResourceSamplerWorker
All Implemented Interfaces:
Sampler
public class JVMResourceSamplerWorker
extends java.lang.Object
implements Sampler

the peek into the James JVM is done using the build-in management (JMX) of J2SE 5 (and probably later) you must start James under a J2SE 5 compatible JVM and add some system properties to the phoenix.[sh|bat] file (all on one line): JVM_OPTS="-Djava.ext.dirs=$JVM_EXT_DIRS -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.ssl=false -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.authenticate=false -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.port=10201 " this class does not even compile on Java versions before JSE 5.
